title: Andrew McCabe: Robert Mueller reveals a counter-intelligence investigation could still exist
description: Former FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe talks to Chuck Todd to reflect on Robert Mueller's testimony in front of the House Intelligence and House Judiciary committees.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
